Class StatsLibrary

java.lang.Object
StatsLibrary
public class StatsLibrary extends Object
The StatsLibrary class is a collection of basic statistical calculations such as mean, median and mode of a dataset.
Author:
Rachel Hussmann

      public double getMeanDouble(double[] values)
      getMeanDouble accepts an array of doubles and finds the mean of the values.
      Parameters:
      values - This method accepts an array of doubles that the user would like the mean calculated for.
      Returns:
      This method returns a double value equal to the mean of the parameter.
